title: About Panacea MedCare
subtitle: Your trusted partner in global healthcare
heading: Who We Are
description: Panacea MedCare is a leading medical tourism facilitator connecting international patients with world-class healthcare facilities in India. With over 8 years of experience, we have helped thousands of patients receive quality medical care at affordable prices.
missionText: To provide accessible, affordable, and world-class medical care to patients worldwide through our network of top-tier hospitals and experienced medical professionals.
visionText: To be the most trusted global healthcare partner, transforming lives through exceptional medical care and personalized patient experiences.

valuesItems.qualityDesc: We partner only with accredited hospitals and experienced doctors
valuesItems.transparencyDesc: Clear communication and honest pricing at every step
valuesItems.affordabilityDesc: World-class care at a fraction of the cost
